elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

name: User Login and Token Retrieval
description:
This feature verifies user login via basic authentication and retrieves the logtoken
  required for all authorized API operations.

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

elements.name: Verify User Get StateList through API

steps.name: User adds headers for StateList
User sends "GET" request to StateList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the stateList response message matches "Tamil Nadu" and save the state id

elements.name: Verify User Get City list through API

steps.name: User adds headers for CityList
User adds request body with state id for city list
User sends "POST" request to CityList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the cityList response message matches "Yercaud" and save the city id

elements.name: Verify add user address through API

steps.name: User adds headers and bearer authorization for accessing address endpoints
User adds request body for add new address "manoj","kumar","9597056072","Apt-123","35","4440","101","600100","123, OMR Street","Home"
User should verify the status code is 200
User sends "POST" request to addUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the addUserAddress response message matches "Address added successfully" and save the address id

elements.name: Verify update user address through API

steps.name: User adds headers and bearer authorization for accessing address endpoints
User adds request body to update address "manoj","Sk","9597056072","Apt-874","35","4440","101","600101","456, PKP Construction","Office"
User sends "PUT" request to updateUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the updateUserAddress response message matches "Address updated successfully"

elements.name: Verify Get User Address through API

steps.name: User adds headers and bearer authorization for accessing get address endpoints
User sends "GET" request to GetUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the GetUserAddress response message matches "OK"

elements.name: Verify Delete User Address through API

steps.name: User adds headers and bearer authorization for accessing address endpoints
User adds request body with address id
User sends "DELETE" request to DeleteAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the DeleteAddress response message matches "Address deleted successfully"

name: User API Automation for OMR Branch Hotel Application
description:
This feature verifies user login, state list, city list, and address 
  management through API automation.

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

elements.name: Get product category and subcategory

steps.name: User sets headers for category list
User sends "GET" request to the CategoryList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the category response message is "OK"
User saves the category ID for main category "Grocery" and subcategory "Fruit & Nuts"

elements.name: Get product list from selected category

steps.name: User sets headers for product list
User sets request body with saved category ID and page number "0"
User sends "POST" request to the ProductList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the product response message is "OK"
User saves the variant ID of product "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

arguments.val: "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

steps.name: User should verify the specification is "500 g"

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

elements.name: Add product to favourites

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization using the saved logtoken for favourites
User sets request body with saved variant ID to add to favourites
User sends "POST" request to the ManageFavourites endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
verify the favourites response message is  "Product added in your favorites"

elements.name: Get user favourites list

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization using the saved logtoken for get favourites
User sends "GET" request to the GetFavourites endpoint

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Verify status code expected:<200> but was:<500>
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89)
	at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:835)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:647)
	at com.omrbranch.stepdefinition.CommonStep.user_should_verify_the_status_code_is(CommonStep.java:15)
	at ✽.User should verify the status code is 200(file:///C:/Users/manoj/eclipse-workspace/AOmrBranchAPIProject_Manojkumar/src/test/resources/features/favourites/TC004_AddFavourites.feature:54)

steps.name: User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the favourites list response message is "Favorites list fetched successfully."

name: Manage User Favourites via API
description:
This feature handles the flow of adding a product to the user's favourites list,
  including login, fetching category, subcategory, product, and verifying the addition.

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

elements.name: from user  favourites list

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization for managing favourites
User sets request body with saved variant ID to remove from favourites
User sends "POST" request to the ManageFavourites endpoint
Verify the response status code is 200
Verify the Remove product response message is "Product removed from your favorites"

elements.name: Verify removed product does not appear in favourites list

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization for retrieving favourites
User sends "GET" request to the GetFavourites endpoint
Verify the response status code is 400
Verify the favourites list response message is "No favorites found"

name: Remove User Favourites via API
description:
This feature handles removing a product from the user's favourites list
  and verifying it no longer appears in the favourites.

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User adds required login headers
User adds basic authentication for login
User sends "POST" request to the login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body contains firstName "Manojkumar" and save the logtoken

elements.name: Verify cart is already empty

steps.name: User should verify the status code is 200

elements.name: Search for product and save category/product IDs

steps.name: User sets headers for SearchProduct
User sets request body to search for product "Nuts"
User sends "POST" request to the SearchProduct endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
Verify the search result includes product name "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri in Fruit & Nuts" and Save the category ID and product ID from response

arguments.val: "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri in Fruit & Nuts"

elements.name: Retrieve product variant from search resultt

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization for GetSearchProductList endpoint
User sets request body with saved product ID
User sends "POST" request to the GetSearchProductList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
Verify the response includes product with specification "500 g" and save the variant ID

elements.name: Add searched product to cart

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization for AddToCart endpoint
User sets request body using saved variant ID and pass the type "plus" to add product to cart
User sends "POST" request to the AddToCart endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
Verify the AddToCart response message is "Product added in cart"

User sends "GET" request to the GetCart endpoint

elements.name: Set address for checkout

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization for SetAddress endpoint
User sets request body with saved address ID and cart ID

Verify the SetAddress response message is "Cart updated successfully"

elements.name: Create an order with payment

  setting up address, and successfully creating an order.

elements.name: Change user profile picture

steps.name: User sets bearer authorization using the saved logtoken for profile picture endpoint
User sets multipart request body with valid image file for profile update
User sends "POST" request to the ChangeProfile endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the response message is "Profile updated Successfully"

name: Change User Profile Picture via API
description:
This feature handles updating a user's profile picture.
  The user must first be authenticated to access the profile update endpoint.
